column3:
It was a beautiful day. 
ewlineIn the morning Tommy and I went to the park to play. We rode our bikes around and went down to the lake. We swam around in the lake and splashed water on other kids.
ewlineWe got back on our bikes and rode back home. Mommy made lunch. It was yummy, peanut butter and jelly sandwiches and milk.
ewlineThen it was time for our nap. We woke up and watched some TV.
ewlineMommy gave us some money for candy later. 
ewlineTommy and I went back to the park to play.
ewlineTommy and I played with a baseball with some other kids.
ewlineThen we played with the football.
ewlineWe went to the store across the street.
ewlineWe bought some candy with the money Mommy gave us.
ewlineWe went back to the park and watched the other kids play as we ate our candy.
ewlineIt was hot, so we went swimming again.  It was fun!
ewlineWe like swimming so we go swimming almost every day.
ewlineWe swam all afternoon until Mommy came down to the park at told us to come home.
ewlineMommy was very upset because we were gone so long.
ewlineMommy was worried that something might have happened to us.
ewlineMommy was not paying attention to her kids and what they were doing for hours. 
ewlineTommy and I told Mommy she needs to pay more attention to us.
ewlineMommy started crying, then Tommy and I started crying.
ewlineMommy said from now on, I must pay more attention to you two. 
ewlineDaddy came home from work and playing softball for his company team.
ewlineDaddy wanted to know what was going on.
ewlineDaddy saw that we were all crying.
ewlineDaddy started to cry too.
ewlineWe all said that we would pay more attention to each other.
ewlineWe all said that we would do more things together like going to the park.
ewlineWe all said we would eat together more often.
column4: one: What did Tommy and I do after playing in the park in the morning?
column8: We had a peanut butter and jelly sandwich and milk for lunch.  Took a nap. Watched some TV.  Then went back to the park
column9: multiple: How did Mommy feel and what did she do when she brought the kids home?
column14: multiple: What happened when daddy came home?
column17: crying, everyone said they would do things together
column19: multiple: what did Tommy and I do at the park in the morning and afternoon?
column21: rode bikes, played baseball, ate candy from the store, played football, swim and watched other kids play.
